name: Before Draugen: Prequel Comic Book
detailed_description:
Before Draugen, there was just Edward and Lissie.

In this 20-page prequel comic book, we explore what happened before the events of Draugen, going all the way back to Edward's childhood in Hanover, Massachusetts and answering a few of the many questions posed by the game's story.

This comic book contains major spoilers for the plot of Draugen, and we recommend reading it only after completing the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670/AMD HD 7870 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
